column4: Can anyone help me on wireless connections in Ubuntu 9.10 on a laptop with no LAN?

I'm really greatful for the information that you have provided me with, but I'm not using Atheros WiFi Card... I'm with a Marvell Technology Group WLAN Card, that has broadcast=yes, and a properly working(according to Ubuntu9.10) driver. Problem is it doesn't find or connects to any networks....
Ok well I can't help you
